sentences.english: Close public restaurants, lounges and shops.
sentences.chinese: 关闭公共餐厅，酒廊和商店。

sentences.english: No one mentions the dreaded word sub - prime over cocktails at Centro or "M on the Bund".
sentences.chinese: 没人在酒廊和餐厅的酒会上提起次贷这个可怕的词。

sentences.english: Ep478 - Jinsheng meets Mingming at the lounge. She left a special impression on Jinsheng.
sentences.chinese: 金生在酒廊遇到认识明明，明明令让他留下深刻印象。

sentences.english: Renovation of Kopitiam, Food Court, Restaurant, Pub, School and other project works.
sentences.chinese: 装修咖啡店，食阁，餐馆，酒廊和其他项目工作。

sentences.english: Ep512 - WaWa visits he lounge bar and says thank you to Jinsheng.
sentences.chinese: 娃娃亲到酒廊拜访金生道谢，金生感动。

sentences.english: The whole family can delight in sumptuous cuisine at one of four restaurants and lounges.
sentences.chinese: 全家人都喜欢丰盛的菜肴在四个餐厅和酒廊。

sentences.english: Features a celebrity-status restaurant or bar in every Tangla Grand Place.
sentences.chinese: 以拥有当地最富盛名的餐厅或酒廊为特色。

sentences.english: The exclusive Yayi Cafe and Mayflower Lounge (25/F) deserves a few lines.
sentences.chinese: 更值得一提的是25层行政酒廊与咖啡厅。

sentences.english: To supervise the other guest relations and the concierge lounge attendants.
sentences.chinese: 监督其他宾客关系部及行政酒廊员工的工作。

definition: compartment (of train, ship etc)/private room at restaurant/rented room for karaoke/hotel room rented by the hour
teahouse/tea-stall with seats/tea-garden or teahouse seat
private room (in a restaurant, or for karaoke etc)/parlor/booth/compartment
